DOC.detailed_description: This open label , single-center Phase I study . All subject receive bicalutamide 150mg orally day 1-28 . Subjects receive CP-675,206 IV one hour day 29 . Doses range 6 mg/kg 15 mg/kg . This cycle repeat month 3 . Once maximum tolerate dose determine , 6 additional subject enrol .
